inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of thoracic aortic aneurysm defined by the following parameters
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients on continuous positive airway pressure (CPAP) therapy for OSA at baseline
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with known central sleep apnoea
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients on morphine or other opioid medication, heroin addiction, alcohol addiction
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with moderate or severe aortic regurgitation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with moderate or severe aortic stenosis
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has abdominal pain and vomiting, drinks around 60 units of alcohol per week, smokes 22 cigarettes per day. He is healthy with no history of allergies or using any medications.
